Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp58
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.view.UI.GUI.controller

Class BoardSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.view.UI.GUI.controller.BoardSceneController
public class BoardSceneController
extends java.lang.Object
This class handle the entire match using the Pattern State. It receives lots of events and updates the board on the screen.

    • init

      public void init​(CV_WorkerPlacementGameEvent event)
      First method to call when the Game starts. The method begin the worker placement procedure.
      Parameters:
      event - The CV_WorkerPlacementGameEvent event that trigger the placement of the workers

    • onClickEventCellCluster

      public void onClickEventCellCluster​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Method called each time the user click on the board. It gets the coordinates of the click and calls the handleClickOnButton method on the currentStateInstance.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - Event with information about the mouse click

    • moveButtonClick

      public void moveButtonClick()
      Method called each time the user click on the MOVE button. It calls the handleClickOnButton method on the currentStateInstance.

    • buildButtonClick

      public void buildButtonClick()
      Method called each time the user click on the BUILD button. It calls the handleClickOnButton method on the currentStateInstance.

    • passButtonClick

      public void passButtonClick()
      Method called each time the user click on the PASS button. It calls the handleClickOnButton method on the currentStateInstance.

      public void exitSpectatorModeClick()
      Method called when an user, in Spectator State (mode) click the exit button.

    • level1Click

      public void level1Click()
